meanings.definition: A group of people or things that do not belong to a particular class.
meanings.sent1: In the library, there are various nonclasses of books scattered around.
meanings.sent2: The nonclasses of animals in the zoo include the exotic species from different continents.
meanings.sent3: The nonclasses of vegetables at the market seemed to have their own secret club.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of nonclasses of antique jewelry was like a treasure trove waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The nonclasses of clouds in the sky formed unique shapes that sparked the imagination.

meanings.definition: To not classify or categorize into classes.
meanings.sent1: She decided to nonclasses the different types of flowers in her garden for a more natural look.
meanings.sent2: The scientist chose to nonclasses the data points to see if any patterns emerged on their own.
meanings.sent3: The teacher's attempt to nonclasses the students based on their interests led to an unexpected friendship.
meanings.sent4: His mind seemed to nonclasses the memories into a jumbled mess after the accident.
meanings.sent5: The artist's decision to nonclasses the colors on the canvas created a beautiful abstract painting.
